Rongjiang is a city in southeastern
. It is in the Qiandongnan Dong Miao Autonomous Region. It is a stopping point between small towns and villages in the region.
It is located on national highway 321 at the intersection between highway 321 and a smaller road that leads directly to
and most of the other cities in the region.
There are not many entertainment options in the small city. You are most likely to be here for transferring buses.
There is a nice selection of counterfeit clothing merchandise at some of the shops.

There is only one hotel that allows foreigners. You can find it by asking which hotel foreigners can stay at. If you go to the front desk of any of the hotels, they will most likely be able to tell you where it is. This is due to government regulations. The hotel costs 149Y per night.
